visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales', each with corresponding data points. The chart should use custom colors for the series and include additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes custom background color and margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis and y-axis are styled with specific colors and font sizes for labels and titles. The data series includes two sets of monthly sales data for the years 2022 and 2023, each with a distinct color. The legend is also styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing representation of the monthly sales data over the two years.
